title: Red Hat Ansible and HashiCorp Terraform Will Be Coming Together
author: Steven J Vaughan-Nichols
description: While no hard plans were revealed at the Red Hat Summit, it's clear that Red Hat's DevOps and HashiCorp's IaC programs will end up working together.
cntitle: 红帽 Ansible 和 HashiCorp Terraform 即将结合
cndescription: 虽然在红帽峰会上没有透露具体的计划，但很明显，红帽的 DevOps 和 HashiCorp 的 IaC 项目最终将协同工作。
